channel.title: Biology on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Biology on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Cockatoos know 30 distinct dance moves
item.description: Ten of 21 known cockatoo species exhibit dance behavior, and one bird executed 17 unique moves.

item.title: Some AI tools don’t understand biology yet
item.description: A collection of new studies on gene activity show that AI tools aren’t very good.

item.title: Peacock Feathers Are Stunning. They Can Also Emit Laser Beams
item.description: Scientists hope their plumage project could someday lead to biocompatible lasers that could safely be embedded in the human body.

item.title: Peacock Feathers Are Stunning. They Can Also Emit Laser Beams
item.description: Scientists hope their plumage project could someday lead to biocompatible lasers that could safely be embedded in the human body.

item.title: Marine biologist for a day: Ars goes shark tagging
item.description: Go shark fishing on the RV Garvin, get hooked on the ideas behind it.

item.title: Experimental surgery performed by AI-driven surgical robot
item.description: In experimental surgery on pig organs, the robot performed well.
